title: ‘That could’ve been me’: Gordon Ramsay breaks down over brother’s heroin addiction in raw new Netflix series
summary_full: With six episodes released, Being Gordon Ramsay offers an unfiltered portrait of the celebrity chef as he launches five restaurants in London’s 22 Bishopsgate. Beyond business, the series explores his turbulent childhood, violent alcoholic father and enduring guilt over his brother’s heroin addiction, revealing how proximity to failure continues to fuel his relentless drive.
